name: @rpitv/glimpse-rpc
description: Package containing the RPC schemas used by Glimpse

scripts.build: proto-loader-gen-types --longs=String --enums=String --defaults --oneofs --grpcLib=@grpc/grpc-js --outDir=dist/ src/service.proto && node -e "fs.cpSync('./LICENSE', './dist/LICENSE')" && node -e "fs.cpSync('./protos', './dist/protos/', {recursive: true})" && node -e "fs.cpSync('./service.proto', './dist/service.proto')"
